title: No chest
body: Hi riot  i am league player i got S on garan and S- on morgana and i did not recive any chest i only played 2 games as morgana  and got s- but no chest as for garan i played him many times and got that s but no chest he is level 3 i gusse help me on this

replies.body: Hey, it looks like you may have hit the limit for the week.  You'll be able to check how many chests you have available to unlock in your client profile panel, and one should refresh each week.
